text: Two-year-old Mary Jo is learning to play in the dark, after her parents, Mr. and Mrs. May, were forced to choose between the little girl's life or being blind for the rest of her life. Little Mary Jo had her eyes removed at the Mayo Clinic after six eminent specialists diagnosed her with retinoblastoma. Four days after the operation, the little girl said, "Mom, I can't wake up... I can't wake up". The five most beautiful short stories in the world Conversations from the Lonely, Bogotá, 2001
title: Los cinco cuentos cortos más bellos del mundo: II
author: Gabriel García Márquez
